1.name: Trouble in Turtle Town
1.obtainText: Hello traveller, my name is Fjorn. If you're looking to help out around here, we could really do with some help killing the snapping turtles invading the forest to the west.
1.completedText: Thank you for defeating those turtles!

2.name: Fred's Quest
2.obtainText: A neighbor of mine, Fred, has recently gone missing. I want you to go find him. Last time I saw him he was headed west into the forest.
2.incompleteText: I don't think its possible to see this text.
2.completedText: Fjorn sent you? Thank goodness you've arrived! I was hunting turtles for soup, when all of a sudden I was knocked out and thrown in a cage!

3.name: Fred's Soup
3.obtainText: I'm starving! I was out here collecting turtle meat so I could make my famous turtle soup. However, I'm feeling a little woozy...could you please collect five River Turtle Meat and bring it back to me?
3.completedText: Thanks so much! I need to get back to the village so I can make my soup!

4.name: Return to Freydell Village
4.obtainText: I appreciate all you've done for me, but I can take it from here. Return to Fjord and see what else he has for you.
4.completedText: Fred sent you back here? Well, good I have some more work for you.

5.name: Giant Turtle
5.obtainText: There's a giant turtle just west of Freydell Village, We believe it's the leader of the turtles invading the forest. Slay it and I will reward you fairly.
5.incompleteText: Have you slain the giant turtle

6.name: The Glacial Tundra
6.obtainText: Travel to The Glacial Tundra, it's just west of here. You can find my friend Higram there, he might have some work for you.
6.incompleteText: Have you traveled to The Glacial Tundra yet?
6.completedText: Ah, old man Fjorn sent you? Good. I have a lot of work that needs to get done.

7.name: A Cold Winter
7.obtainText: This winter is a brutal one... the trolls to the west raided our house and stole our furs, could you go hunt some mammoth so that we could use their fur?
7.completedText: Thank the lords! We will survive another winter.

8.name: Trolls to the West
8.obtainText: Those Trolls have been bothering us for too long! It's time we strike back! Go to their village, it's just west of here and slay them all!

9.name: Your Move, Chief
9.obtainText: The leader of the Trolls in the village is a powerful man. Take him down and they will lose their morale!
9.incompleteText: Have you killed the Troll Chieftan yet?
9.completedText: Finally... we can live in peace.

10.name: The Last of Them
10.obtainText: I have reason to believe that there are more Trolls in a cave just north of the village. Find them and slay them. I will reward you handsomely.
10.incompleteText: Go find the cave and slay those Trolls!
10.completedText: Well done! Here is your reward.

11.name: Stamping out the Fires
11.obtainText: The Cultists are rallying outside of our camp to the north west. They need to be slowed down. Find and destroy five Cultist Bonfires and return back to me.
11.incompleteText: Have you extinguished the Cultist Bonfires?
11.completedText: Nice work! I have another task for you. Talk to me again when you are ready.

12.name: Full Momentum
12.obtainText: The Cultist Commanders are readying for their final assault. Take them out and let them know who they are messing with! You can find them in the encampments to the north west.
12.incompleteText: Have you slain those Commanders yet?

13.name: Overrun with Wolves
13.obtainText: These once peaceful lands have been overrun with wolves. My tribes can no longer survive here. Could you help us out?
13.completedText: I am very impressed with your skills. Talk to me if you need more work.

14.name: Alpha Wolf
14.obtainText: There is a nook just north east of here where the Alpha Wolf resides, I need you to slay it. If you follow the road west you should be able to find him.
14.incompleteText: Have you slain the Alpha Wolf?

15.name: Ironwell Camp
15.obtainText: Thank you for all of your help here. Without the trolls pestering us, we should be able to survive the winter. I think your help might be best used elsewhere. Last I heard, they have their hands full down in Ironwell City. Maybe if you go to the military camp just outside of the city they'll need some help. It's a bit of a trek south east of here.
15.completedText: You'd like to help? Well, I suppose we need all the help we can get. Let me see if I can find something for you to do.

16.obtainText: Hello there.. I see you have found yourself fighting in this world. We need capable adventurers like yourself. Up north you will find the Darrowswamps. This place is full of creatures the people of Valburn can not fight as we are mostly farmers and gatherers. Can you help and see what is going on in the swamps?
16.incompleteText: Have you dared to adventure up north, to the Darrowswamps yet?
16.completedText: Hello, Adventurer. You have been sent from the south? Any message? -no? -so strange... You want to help us here in these mystical swamps? That is great to hear! I believe you will have much work up here fore sure.
16.name: Something is Lurking in the North

17.name: Well Then... Here We Are
17.obtainText: For now, I just need a ale and this snakebite doesn't really help me move to the closest market. The closest market is to the east. The Sunspring Market. Can you go there and get me some antidote and ale?
17.incompleteText: Have you brung me the ale? The antidote? No?Man, my life hangs in the balance!
17.completedText: Thank you. You saved a weak adventurer's life. Now, where were we.

18.name: Chopping Their Supplies
18.obtainText: The Cultists in the woods just north of here have been chopping down trees to collect wood for the winter to come. If we can take that wood then we will be able to drive them out of the woods. Go collect all of the wood that they have chopped.
18.completedText: Nice! They won't last the winter without their wood.

19.name: Copper Ore...
19.obtainText: Hello, so you wish to craft your own armor? I bet you wish! Well, first you would have to find some Copper ore out in the world. Good luck finding any. Then, when you are ready you can smelt them at that forge over there.
19.incompleteText: Have you found any ore yet?
19.completedText: You smelted some ore. The Copper bars are now visible in your bags.

20.name: It's Craftingtime!
20.obtainText: Now it is time to craft some armor on the anvil to the right of the forge..
20.incompleteText: .. You are missing Weak Flux. Flux is normally sold by merchants and vendors.
20.completedText: You crafted your first item! Check your bags to equip it.

21.name: More Ore?
21.obtainText:
I couldn't unnotice that you were over that anvil over there and forged yourself a armor piece? Is that right? That anvil is mine though, you would have to search for a Blacksmithing Approval to use my blacksmith area.

Head out there and gather some more ores and you may get my permission.
21.completedText:
See there. I take these. You were sent by me, remember.

Come back when I need you.

Thanks, now begone.

22.name: Adventure awaits in the swamp! ...when you are ready.
22.obtainText: Well, here lies the swamp. And I really want to fight alongside you in there. But... there is a big But... You are far too inexperienced yet. Come back when you are more experienced. (34)
22.incompleteText: Shouldn't you be out there gaining glory for your cause? You seem a little lost, we can go into the swamps when you are capable of doing so.
22.completedText: Ah! You finally have a reason to return! I knew you would become atleast a little more powerful one day!

23.name: Been waiting to lurk the swamps for too long...
23.obtainText: Yeah, well. my leader... ehm, to my left. He only accepts those he think is worthful to have with him into the swamps. And I am sure I have seen you before. Well, atleast, he is ready to have you with him in there! See it as a good opportunity and gain glory for the King and the Country!
23.incompleteText: So, you are not sure you want to join yet?
23.completedText: SO glad you would join us, -erhm, him! He should want to talk to you now. If you don't mind.

24.name: Mugglet.. My Dog!
24.obtainText:
Well, some weeks ago, I sent my nephew to guard and scout the swamps northwest of here. I also sent with him my dog! I miss my dear dog, Mugglet. I Wish that someone like you could by any chance check out on him? And my nephew at the same go.

Sadly I am stuck here for duty until next month and cannot go myself.

I hope you take my task.
24.incompleteText: Have you checked in on my Dog, Mugglet? I wish I could see him. I love him dearly.
24.completedText: The dog looks at you with a scared face. Like it has seen nightmares in the shadows of the swamp.

25.name: Mugglet's Current Lord
25.obtainText: Mugglet hints to you that his current Lord is near. He also hints you towards him.
25.completedText:
Oh, you found Mugglet! He is not mine, but I took him with me from Ironwell City! -Oh, you have met my nephew already? I am glad you show you cared for my family members! You can have this for your time.

Oh, you also wonder why the dog stands in the swamp entrance?

Isn't that what dogs are for? -To stay guard? Atleast for the night! That is what I use him for!

26.name: Your Place in this World
26.obtainText: So you are awake? I was wonder who had camped in this illegal area. You should meet with the Mayor in the town north of here and hear what he has to say about illegal crimes.
26.incompleteText: Why haven't you packed down your tent yet? This area belongs to the King and his realm.
26.completedText:
You say you had camped by the waterfall, south of here? Why would I care, it's in the wilderness!

Well now, you look like a person that could take a fight! We could need people like yourself. Why won't you look around and see if you somehow can help us around here? -Dismissed!
